title: This "Scene Missing" font
content:
Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bscap0060.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101015062422/http:/typophile.com/files/bscap0060.jpg) | 20.37 KB |
author: DwightFry

comments.content: I think it is an old typeface called Pastel, which was used often in silent movies. Ray Larabie did two fonts based on it called [Silentina Film and Silentina Movie](http://web.archive.org/web/20101015062422/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/silentina/). The "Movie" version is the closer match of the two.
